message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a product for $10000. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, and I'm eager to make a sale. I assure you that this product is a great value, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase. Will you take it home today?
I appreciate the opportunity and am willing to take the risk given the lack of sales history. Thank you for offering me this chance to purchase a product at $10000.

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in purchasing a product from me. As you may know, my sales history is still in its early stages, but I'm excited to share with you that I've just made my first sale, which is a great sign that my products are in high demand.
